Callum McGregor, Kyogo, Daizen Maeda and Liel Abada have all agreed contract extensions. entry.summary: Celtic made nine additions over the course of the recently concluded summer transfer window. entry.title: Summer 23 Transfer Window assessment
entry.summary: In a busy transfer window, Celtic signed nine new players and sold four from the first team squad. Central defence saw two planned arrivals: Maik Nawrocki (22) and Gustaf Lagerbielke (23), and the departure of Carl Starfelt (28). Starfelt’s two-year partnership with Cameron Carter-Vickers was remarkably successful. They only once experience defeat in a domestic [...]

entry.title: IAN YOUNG: GREAT UNCAPPED CELTS (Part Two)
entry.summary: CQN is turning the spotlight again on the Celtic players who never had the honour of playing for their country.
